institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Continuing employment incentive payment and operating rules/Article 10 (payment amount and method, etc.)
contents: Article 10 (Payment amount and method, etc.) ① The incentive payment amount pursuant to Article 18, Paragraph 2 of the Decree and Article 9, Paragraph 1 of this Rule is as shown in Appendix 1. However, if the period of not engaging in the occupation is less than 30 days per year, the payment is made on a pro-rata basis and any amount less than KRW is rounded off., ② The chairman deposits the incentive into a financial transaction account in the name of the person eligible for payment., ③ Paragraph 2. The deadline for payment of incentives is 10 days from the date of notification of the decision to pay incentives pursuant to Article 9 (1).
